name: Google BigQuery
natural_language_description: 这是 Google BigQuery 节点。主要用于: Consume Google BigQuery API

oldVersionNotice.displayName: New node version available: get the latest version with added features from the nodes panel.
oldVersionNotice.name: oldVersionNotice
oldVersionNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: New node version available: get the latest version with added features from the nodes panel.

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: oAuth2

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: record

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Create (值: create) - Create a new record
Get Many (值: getAll) - Retrieve many records

projectId.name: projectId
projectId.description: ID of the project to retrieve all rows from. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
projectId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Project Name or ID | 作用: ID of the project to retrieve all rows from. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

datasetId.name: datasetId
datasetId.description: ID of the dataset to retrieve all rows from. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
datasetId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Dataset Name or ID | 作用: ID of the dataset to retrieve all rows from. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

tableId.name: tableId
tableId.description: ID of the table to retrieve all rows from. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
tableId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Table Name or ID | 作用: ID of the table to retrieve all rows from. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

columns.name: columns
columns.description: Comma-separated list of the item properties to use as columns
columns.natural_language_description: 参数名: Columns | 作用: Comma-separated list of the item properties to use as columns | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: selectedFields (值: None) - Subset of fields to return, supports select into sub fields. Example: `selectedFields = "a,e.d.f"`

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

simple.name: simple
simple.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data
simple.natural_language_description: 参数名: Simplify | 作用: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data | 默认值: True
